TopicTitle: Gorkounov's Kethane Mining Corporation - New Series

Articles.Content:
So I decided to start a series. Constructive criticism and feedback is much appreciated. I want to make quality content for people.

This is me basically trying to create a giant Kethane network in the Kerbol system. With a working Kethane network, opportunities for other ships such as public transit, research, and delivery missions are possible. First I create a solid and good Kerbin-Mun foundation then interplanetary missions will start.

Episode 1 - "Groundwork"

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yihfOLooRUk

Episode 2

Coming soon! Done filming.
